attributes.action: Cap the pricing of NCP Car Parks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Council-run street parking charges are, on average, 60p per hour, yet NCP charges are commonly 3 times that amount, even in ground level open car parks. Help end the monopoly of this money-grabbing organisation by capping its charges and bringing them in-line with other operators.
